sourcesContent:
<template>
  <input class="input" type="text">
  <slot></slot>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: "my-input"
}
</script>


<style scoped>
.input {
  width: 100%;
  border: 2px solid black;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  margin: 2px;
}
</style>
